chart.title: Share of people living in urban and rural areas
chart.note: Because the estimates of city and metropolitan areas are based on national definitions of what constitutes a city or metropolitan area, cross-country comparisons should be made with caution.
chart.citation: World Urbanization Prospects - UN Population Division, via World Bank (2026); World Bank based on data from the UN Population Division (2026)
